item.title: 亚洲应对美国关税新格局
item.description: 我是马尔科姆-斯科特，驻悉尼的国际经济企业编辑。今天我们来看看美国最新的关税协议对亚洲意味着什么。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Malcolm Scott, international economics enterprise editor in Sydney. Today we’re looking at what the latest US tariff deals mean for Asia. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: AppLovin卖空者发现移动广告技术的丑陋内幕
item.description: 欢迎收看《深度科技》（Tech In Depth），这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日时事通讯。今天，奥利维亚-索隆（Olivia Solon）将就谷歌和 Meta 的主要竞争对手之一侵犯用户隐私以求发展的一系列报道发表看法。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Olivia Solon addresses the spate of reports alleging one of Google and Meta’s big rivals is infringing on user privacy to get ahead.】

item.title: 亚洲的特朗普关税税率生效率低于威胁值
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统的最新关税协议在经历了几个月的盲目不确定性之后，开始为企业带来一些清晰的信息。【原文：President Donald Trump’s latest tariff deals are starting to offer businesses some clarity after months of blinding uncertainty.】

item.title: 英国石油公司称发现部分阿塞拜疆石油可能受到污染
item.description: 英国石油公司（BP Plc）称，已发现从土耳其港口运往全球市场的阿塞拜疆原油可能受到污染。【原文：BP Plc said possible contamination has been identified relating to crude shipments from Azerbaijan that get delivered to global markets from a port in Turkey.】

item.title: Tom Hayes 利博尔上诉案历时十年：时间轴
item.description: 汤姆-海耶斯（Tom Hayes）的法律命运自 13 年前作为操纵 Libor 的全球调查的一部分首次被英国警方逮捕以来就来回摇摆。【原文：Tom Hayes’ legal fortunes have swung back and forth since he was first arrested by UK police 13 years ago as part of global investigations into Libor rigging.】

item.title: AT&T 促销活动使移动电话客户激增
item.description: AT&T Inc.公布的第二季度财报显示，该公司业绩大部分超出华尔街预期，其中无线电话用户增长速度超过预期，因为该公司提供了各种福利和激励措施，以吸引竞争对手的客户。【原文：AT&T Inc. reported second-quarter results that mostly exceeded Wall Street estimates, including faster-than-expected growth in wireless phone subscribers after offering perks and incentives to attract customers from rivals.】

item.title: 摩根大通警告：盈利前景黯淡，股市可能会出现自满情绪
item.description: 摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：Signs of stock-market complacency are emerging as the searing equities rally coincides with an acceleration in earnings downgrades, according to JPMorgan Chase & Co. quantitative strategists.】

item.title: 客户消费谨慎，Infosys下调销售预测
item.description: 信息技术巨头 Infosys Ltd. 上调了本年度销售额预期的下限，表明该公司对客户在业务转型项目上的谨慎支出有了更多的把握。【原文：Information technology giant Infosys Ltd. raised the lower end of its sales forecast for the year, signaling it had more certainty of how cautious clients would spend on business transformation projects.】

item.title: 南非在政治纷争后修改预算程序
item.description: 在今年的预算提案被两次修改之后，南非国库计划对其 2026 年预算编制过程进行改革。【原文：South Africa’s National Treasury plans to revamp its 2026 budget-preparation process after political wrangling saw this year’s proposal altered twice.】

item.title: 日本交易重振动物精神，股价再创新高
item.description:
投资者希望其他地方也能效仿这一协议，从而消除笼罩在市场上空的阴霾。【原文：

Investors hope the agreement will be mimicked elsewhere. removing a cloud over markets.

】

item.title: 特斯拉前景暗淡，马斯克推动的机器人出租车愿景面临考验
item.description: 特斯拉公司（Tesla Inc. ）的核心汽车制造业务正面临着日益恶化的前景，这是对首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）能否凭借其对自动驾驶未来的愿景提升股价的一次重大考验。【原文：Tesla Inc.’s core car-making business is facing a deteriorating outlook, providing a major test of Chief Executive Officer Elon Musk’s ability to lift the stock price with his vision of a self-driving future.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织称马拉维因拖欠债务面临 20 亿美元储备金缺口
item.description: 根据国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）的数据，马拉维今年的债务支出将比外汇储备高出 20 亿美元，这一数额几乎相当于该国经济总量的五分之一。【原文：Malawi’s debt bill this year will be $2 billion more than what it holds in foreign reserves, according to the International Monetary Fund — an amount that’s equivalent to almost a fifth of the nation’s total economy.】

item.title: 印度最大液化天然气进口商 Petronet 寻求 14 亿美元当地贷款
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度最大的天然气进口商 Petronet 液化天然气有限公司正在寻求至少 1 200 亿卢比（14 亿美元）的贷款，用于新建一座石化厂和一个液化天然气终端。【原文：India’s largest importer of natural gas Petronet LNG Ltd. is seeking a loan of at least 120 billion rupees ($1.4 billion) for a new petrochemical plant and an LNG terminal, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 印度太阳能制造商向 10 千兆瓦的目标迈进助推莫迪的全球雄心
item.description: 印度太阳能制造商 Indosol Solar Ltd. 利用政府支持国内制造业的激励措施，预计到 2026 年将在整个价值链上建设 10 千兆瓦的产能。【原文：Indian solar maker Indosol Solar Ltd. expects to build 10 gigawatts of capacity spanning the value chain by 2026, tapping into government incentives that support domestic manufacturing.】

item.title: 备忘录股票质疑者关注对冲基金策略，押注逆转
item.description: 巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）表示，现在是时候对推动科尔公司（Kohl's Corp.）和Opendoor科技公司（Opendoor Technologies Inc.【原文：Barclays Plc says that it’s about time to pump the brakes on a meme stock craze that’s driven sharp rallies in companies like Kohl’s Corp. and Opendoor Technologies Inc.】

item.title: 美日达成贸易协议，避险吸引力减弱，国债下跌
item.description: 由于美国与日本达成贸易协议后避险需求减弱，周三国债有望结束五日连涨。【原文：Treasuries were poised to end a five-day streak of gains Wednesday as demand for havens waned after the US inked a trade deal with Japan.】

item.title: 调查显示：尽管存在关税风险，盈利仍将提振股市
item.description: 最新的《市场脉搏》调查显示，美国股市将摆脱关税风险，从第二季度财报季中获得提振。【原文：US stocks will shrug off tariff risks to get a boost from the second-quarter earnings season, the latest Markets Pulse survey showed.】

item.title: 原油狂飙的一季度让大型石油交易平台成为焦点
item.description: 在地缘政治引发价格剧烈波动并导致部分交易员陷入误区之后，大型石油公司预计将公布四年来最低的季度利润。【原文：Big oil companies are forecast to post their lowest quarterly profits in four years after geopolitics whipsawed prices and left some of their traders on the wrong side of the volatility.】

item.title: Krispy Kreme、GoPro 大涨，市场热捧 "备忘录 "类股票
item.description: 随着 Krispy Kreme Inc. 和 GoPro Inc. 在早盘交易中大涨，"备忘录 "股票的复兴似乎可能会延续到下一天。【原文：The meme-stock revival looks like it might stretch into another day with Krispy Kreme Inc. and GoPro Inc. surging in early trading.】

item.title: 汤姆-海斯（Tom Hayes）在英国最高法院的上诉中胜诉，推翻了十年前对 Libor 的判决
item.description: 汤姆-海耶斯（Tom Hayes）是瑞银集团前明星交易员，曾因操纵 Libor 而卷入丑闻，在入狱十年后，英国最高法院推翻了对他的刑事定罪，还了他清白。【原文：Tom Hayes, the former star UBS Group AG trader who became the face of the Libor rigging scandal, overturned his criminal conviction at the UK’s top court clearing his name a decade after he was sent to jail.】

item.title: 特朗普获得的交易越多，市场信心越强
item.description: 随着唐纳德-特朗普总统终于开始签署贸易协议，全球投资者在经历了几个月的不确定性后信心大增。【原文：The world’s investors are enjoying a confidence boost after months of uncertainty as President Donald Trump finally starts signing trade deals.】

item.title: 欧盟警告使用俄罗斯石油的炼油商，安巴尼的信实集团成为焦点
item.description: 在欧盟宣布对使用俄罗斯原油生产的柴油实施新的限制后，印度信实工业有限公司的石油采购模式受到了审查。【原文：The oil-procurement patterns of India’s Reliance Industries Ltd. are coming under scrutiny after the European Union announced new restrictions on diesel made from Russian crude.】

item.title: 中国称已就巨型水坝计划的影响与邻国沟通
item.description: 中国说，它已与下游国家就其在西藏的新大坝项目进行了商谈，这项大型工程将影响印度和孟加拉国的一个重要水源。【原文：China said it has talked with countries downstream about its new dam project in Tibet, a massive undertaking that will affect a key source of water for India and Bangladesh.】

item.title: 香港建筑商丽新寻求更多银行支持贷款再融资
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，香港开发商丽新发展有限公司（Lai Sun Development Co.【原文：Hong Kong developer Lai Sun Development Co. has been working to win banks’ backing for a HK$3.5 billion ($446 million) loan refinancing deal, but after about six months of talks, nearly half the lenders still aren’t on board, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 瑞士信贷在欧盟外汇交易调查中被削减罚款
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）在与欧盟监管机构就瑞士信贷集团（Credit Suisse Group AG）参与外汇交易价格操纵卡特尔一案进行的诉讼中败诉，但在法官将罚金削减近三分之二后，败诉也变得更有甜头。【原文：UBS Group AG lost the crux of its case against European Union regulators over Credit Suisse Group AG’s involvement in a foreign-exchange price fixing cartel — but defeat was sweetened after judges slashed the fine by nearly two-thirds.】

item.title: 荷兰在国家帮助下有望实现天然气储存目标
item.description: 荷兰政府相信该国将在今年冬天之前确保足够的天然气库存，并计划从 2026 年开始建立 "应急储备"，以缓解交易商对储气库注入缓慢的担忧。【原文：The Dutch government is confident the country will secure enough natural gas inventories ahead of this winter and plans to establish an “emergency reserve” starting in 2026 — seeking to ease trader concerns over sluggish storage injections.】

item.title: S.非洲通胀率在议息会议前创四个月新高
item.description: 由于牛肉和蔬菜价格飙升，6 月份南非通胀率升至四个月来的最高点。【原文：South African inflation quickened to a four-month high in June, as prices of beef and vegetables spiked.】

item.title: 卡塔尔确认申办 2036 年奥运会，这在中东地区尚属首次
item.description: 卡塔尔确认将申办 2036 年夏季奥运会，力争成为第一个主办世界最大体育赛事之一的中东国家。【原文：Qatar confirmed it will bid for the 2036 Summer Olympics, trying to become the first Middle Eastern nation to host one of the world’s biggest sporting events.】

item.title: 据说塔塔资本将寻求更高的 IPO 估值目标
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，塔塔资本有限公司正在为其计划中的首次公开募股寻求 180 亿至 200 亿美元的估值，并可能最快于本周提交最新的红鲱鱼招股说明书草案。【原文：Tata Capital Ltd. is seeking a valuation of $18 billion to $20 billion in its planned initial public offering and could file an updated draft red herring prospectus as soon as this week, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 瑞士银行 EFG 警告美元走软，净利润跃升 36
item.description: EFG International AG 表示，今年上半年，美元疲软使其资产价值减少了 117 亿瑞士法郎（约合 148 亿美元），而这家瑞士银行的净利润增长了 36%。【原文：EFG International AG said a weakening dollar mostly eroded the value of its assets by 11.7 billion Swiss francs ($14.8 billion) in the first half of the year as the Swiss bank reported a 36% gain in net profit.】
